Projects

Projects that I am involved with in some capacity or other and other useful links
  • Base Touch
    Base Touch was created from a meeting minds from different industries including television, analytics and digital marketing. Responsible for marketing & business development

  • Canterbury Harriers
    Canterbury Harriers Running Club aims to promote running for all standards and ages and for both sexes. - Overall responsibility for site design, development and maintenance.

  • Cultured Llama
    Poetry publisher - Overall responsibility for site design, development and maintenance.

  • Man On The Run
    Man On The Run is a 5K charity run for men and boys, aiming to raise awareness of testicular cancer. All money raised goes to Cancer Research UK. - Overall responsibility for marketing planning & strategy as well as technical implementations such as the website & race entry system.

  • Red Sands Radio
    Red Sands Radio returns to serve the Thames Estuary Basin & North Kent Coastal Towns 2nd July 2011. From the Coast to the City 87.7FM & online. - Responsible for maintenance and further development of the site.

  • Running Coach
    UK Level 4 senior running coach provides tailor made programmes designed to help you achieve your running dreams. Visit the site to find out more. Responsible for marketing.

  • Bit.ly Profile
    My Bit.ly profile and various links
